00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace analysis {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// creates pseudo-2D-gel images from survey scan data 
00038 class Pseudo2DGel : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     struct Config
00043     {
00044         std::string label;
00045         float mzLow;
00046         float mzHigh;
00047         int binCount;
00048         float zRadius;
00049         bool bry;
00050         bool binSum;
00051         bool ms2;
00052 
00053         Config(const std::string& args); 
00054     };
00055 
00056     Pseudo2DGel(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00057 
00058     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00059     //@{
00060     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00061 
00062     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00063                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00064 
00065     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00066                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00067 
00068     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00069     //@}
00070 
00071     private:
00072     class Impl;
00073     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00074     Pseudo2DGel(Pseudo2DGel&);
00075     Pseudo2DGel& operator=(Pseudo2DGel&);
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 template<>
00080 struct analyzer_strings<Pseudo2DGel>
00081 {
00082     static const char* id() {return "image";}
00083     static const char* description() {return "create pseudo-2D-gel image";}
00084     static const char* argsFormat() {return "[args]";}
00085     static std::vector<std::string> argsUsage()
00086     {
00087         std::vector<std::string> result;
00088         result.push_back("label=xxxx (set filename label to xxxx)");
00089         result.push_back("mzLow=N (set low m/z cutoff)");
00090         result.push_back("mzHigh=N (set high m/z cutoff)");
00091         result.push_back("binCount=N (set histogram bin count)");
00092         result.push_back("zRadius=N (set intensity function z-score radius [=2])");
00093         result.push_back("bry (use blue-red-yellow gradient)");
00094         result.push_back("binSum (sum intensity in bins [default = max intensity])");
00095         result.push_back("ms2 (indicate masses selected for ms2)");
00096         return result; 
00097     }
00098 };
